portfolio_branding1_alt:
Brand Overview: Building the ‚ÄúLhong Lai Dimsum & Kopi‚Äù Brand

‚ÄúLhong Lai Dimsum & Kopi‚Äù is a caf√©-style dim sum brand crafted through a creative brand-building process that blends traditional Chinese cuisine with Thai cultural elements, offering a nostalgic, warm, and detail-oriented dining atmosphere.

The brand is positioned to be modern yet sentimental, evoking warmth, retro charm, and a heartfelt passion for flavor and experience ‚Äî connecting with the new generation of consumers who seek more than just food.

üéØ Brand Building Objectives

Establish a strong and unique position in a dim sum market with few direct competitors
Communicate a brand image that is warm, charming, and distinct
Prioritize brand experience as the core of customer engagement
Meet the expectations of modern consumers who value taste, atmosphere, and attention to detail

üß¨ Brand DNA

‚ÄúAuthentic Cantonese dim sum fused with Thai ingredients ‚Äî served 24/7‚Äù
A harmony of Chinese heritage, Thai craftsmanship, and caf√© lifestyle

üí° Key Brand Strengths

Evokes a feeling of ‚ÄúLhong Lai‚Äù (deep fondness) through food, ambiance, and service
Clear and consistent brand identity through logo, colors, font, and packaging
Employs storytelling and experience-based marketing
Offers a membership and point-collection system to build long-term loyalty
Designed for future brand expansion and franchising opportunities

‚ú®

Lhong Lai is not just a dim sum restaurant ‚Äî it‚Äôs a brand crafted to make people ‚Äúfall in love from the very first bite,‚Äù backed by thoughtful branding, clear strategy, and memorable customer experiences at every touchpoint.
portfolio_branding2_alt:
Chawaveewan: Elevating Thai Natural Heritage through Creative Design

Chawaveewan is a creative wellness brand that transforms natural loofah fibers ‚Äî a traditional Thai material ‚Äî into innovative self-care products by integrating them with bath bombs, creating a unique 2-in-1 bathing experience.

This product addresses consumer pain points by softening the loofah through the fizzing process, adding convenience and indulgence at the same time. The result is a functional and sensorial product that not only cleanses but relaxes.

By applying design thinking and cultural storytelling, Chawaveewan enhances the value of an everyday natural item through:

Thoughtful product design
Sensory branding through Thai-inspired scents
Elegant, locally handcrafted packaging
Co-branding opportunities with spas and hotels

The brand represents a modern reinterpretation of Thai identity and sustainability, creating new market opportunities for traditional materials while supporting local craftsmanship and eco-conscious lifestyles.
portfolio_branding3_alt: This project serves as a comprehensive example of brand analysis ‚Äî covering everything from strategic planning, brand communication, to consumer behavior insights. All elements work together to support the goal of expanding the customer base and strengthening the brand identity of Backstreet House Pattaya in the specialty coffee market.
portfolio_media1_desc: Organize a series of influencer interviews to gain insights into their views on emerging digital trends and branding strategies.
portfolio_media2_desc: Short Film Competition under the Proud Thai Project
portfolio_media2_alt:
Short Film Project: Proud Thai
This short film competition, titled "Proud Thai: Smile, Heritage, and Creativity", invites youth and students to explore Thai identity through storytelling. With the central theme of the Thai smile, the project aims to promote cultural understanding, emotional connection, and social harmony‚Äîstarting from a simple but powerful smile.
